name: The Last Medic (itch)
description:
You are the daughter of the Head of Quenns Day Hospital and you just come back from your study to visit your father. You entered the hospital and it turned out that your father had died with his chopped head placed on a chair and his body was lying on the floor of the hallway. Now, your mission is to find out what happened and who is the killer of your father.

This project was created for assignment purpose. All assets are captured from Free Unreal Engine Assets and Royalty Free Assets. 

Button Controls :

- WSAD to move

- Left Click and Drag to pull over objects

- “E” to get the informations from the pulled over objects.
